page.title: 20MELANIE'S DANCING
page.content: I belong to a dancing club.It is owned by Trisha Meenaghan and is called the " Trisha Meenaghan Shool Of Dancing".It is held at the Headlands church rooms although their are lessons at Earls Barton and Daventry.I have lessons for grade four modern ,grade four tap and senior grade ballet also I go to limbering classes(which do not have grades).Trisha teaches greek and national but I gave that up.Every year we enter festivals ,the last one we entered was "Rugby Festival of Dance and Drama " which is held at Daventry Community Centre.I like dancing because it is chance to meet new people and make new friends also I enjoy it and it leads to other things.
